entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:09 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
